original_text: They have now compassed us in our steps: they have set their eyes bowing down to the earth;
korean_text: 이제 우리가 걸어가는 것을 그들이 에워싸서 노려보고 땅에 넘어뜨리려 하나이다

sentences.original_text: They have now compassed us in our steps:
they have set their eyes bowing down to the earth;
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 땅으로 고개를 숙이고 눈을 고정했습니다;
